dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your Twitch channel
dashboard.createToken: Create a token first to view channel data

configurations.title: Twitch Configurations
configurations.subtitle: Manage your Twitch application credentials
configurations.noConfigurationsText: Add your first Twitch application to get started
configurations.name: Name (Optional)
configurations.clientIdHint: 30-31 characters, lowercase letters and numbers only
configurations.clientSecretHint: 30 characters, lowercase letters and numbers only
configurations.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the configuration "{{name}}"?
configurations.deleteWarning: Warning: This configuration has {{count}} active token(s). You must delete those tokens first.
configurations.configDeleteError: Cannot delete configuration. There are {{count}} token(s) using this configuration.
configurations.requiredFields: Client ID and Client Secret are required

tokens.title: Twitch Tokens
tokens.subtitle: Manage your Twitch access tokens
tokens.noTokensText: Generate your first token to get started
tokens.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this token?

webhooks.title: EventSub Webhooks
webhooks.subtitle: Manage your Twitch EventSub subscriptions
webhooks.noWebhooksText: Create a new EventSub subscription or sync existing subscriptions from Twitch
webhooks.deleteConfirmation:
Are you sure you want to delete this webhook subscription?

Type: {{type}}
webhooks.needAppToken: You need at least one app token to sync webhooks. Create an app token first.

apiTester.title: Twitch API Tester
apiTester.subtitle: Test Twitch API endpoints interactively
apiTester.noTokens: You need at least one token to use the API tester

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

landing.title: Manage Your Twitch
landing.subtitle: Generate OAuth tokens, manage EventSub webhooks, and streamline your Twitch development workflow — all in one place.
landing.tokenManagerDesc: Generate User and App Access Tokens with custom scopes using OAuth Device Flow.
landing.webhookManagerDesc: Create, list, and manage your Twitch EventSub webhook subscriptions effortlessly.
landing.secureStorageDesc: Your sensitive data is encrypted with AES-256-GCM and stored securely.
landing.footer: Built for Twitch developers, by developers
